name: LEFT DARK
description:
Introduction:

Hi everyone! This is my very first submission for the 'RPG Maker MZ Touch the Stars' game jam. I had done my best and I hope everyone will enjoy my early access game.

Synopsis:

Locals were shocked when Neeta Watson was found dead at the Pinecreek Memorial Park. There were rumors suggesting that Neeta was last seen with Amez the night before she was found murdered. Being the prime suspect, Amez must go through different dimensions, gather clues and find the truth to clear his name and prove his innocence for once and for all.

Features:
  • Powered by the latest version of RPG Maker MZ.
  • Comes with English voiceovers for in-game cutscenes.
  • In-game digital manual for easy to understand guidance.
  • Integration with AI through cognitive technologies.
How to Play:
  • Use arrow or WASD keys to move around.
  • Use Enter or Space key to interact with people and objects.
  • Use Escape key to access the inventory, save your game, adjust settings and quit the game.
  • Explore the environment and find all the clues to advance to the next area.
Final Words:

I started developing this game just a couple of days before the submission deadline ended and due to time constraints, some aspects of the game are either unfinished or unpolished. However, players will still be able to finish the game.  :)

Updates and development notes will be posted in the Devlog page. Any feedback would be appreciated.
